name: Elevator Action(remake using Julie Mehretu's work)
name_original: Elevator Action(remake using Julie Mehretu's work)
description:
Elevator action has been inspired of the 1983 game of the same name. However it has been modified to fit an artists theme. This artist is Julie Mehretu.

In Elevator action your goal is to get to the bottom of the map while fighting off enemies.

When you win the game you get to view the artwork that was created by you and the enemies movement, in the style of a Julie Mehretu artwork .
